reporting.reportgraph.GraphQuery:
SET @FromDate ={%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_DateTrim(@FromDate,'{%if (Interval == null) { "year" } else { Interval }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)7028f8875a9da639c6887714d17eecc01cfbf272edcaf753657e06700290627e%}');
SELECT {%if (Columns == null) { "Date" } else { Columns }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)5c711fbcaf84b8857c367a8ab518b317f96f54bd74667fc678fb10375007c55a%} AS StartTime , T1.Hits AS Time FROM {%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_EnsureDates (@FromDate,@ToDate,'{%if (Interval == null) { "year" } else { Interval }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)7028f8875a9da639c6887714d17eecc01cfbf272edcaf753657e06700290627e%}') AS Dates LEFT JOIN (SELECT HitsStartTime AS StartTime, SUM(HitsValue) / SUM(HitsCount) AS hits FROM Analytics_Statistics INNER JOIN {%if (AnalyticsTable == null) { "Analytics_YearHits" } else { AnalyticsTable }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)dfafdb7f90ce291a967b1389d7be8e2bddccda18529aa1ac6303ae022e1f173d%} ON {%if (AnalyticsTable == null) { "Analytics_YearHits" } else { AnalyticsTable }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)dfafdb7f90ce291a967b1389d7be8e2bddccda18529aa1ac6303ae022e1f173d%}.HitsStatisticsID = Analytics_Statistics.StatisticsID WHERE (StatisticsSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID) AND (StatisticsCode = 'avgtimeonpage') AND StatisticsObjectID = @NodeID AND StatisticsObjectCulture = @CultureCode GROUP BY HitsStartTime) AS T1 ON T1.StartTime = [Date]
